attributes.action: Give adolescent mental health more funding
attributes.additional_details:
Mental health services, especially in Suffolk are not being funded thoroughly.
Mental health issues are just serious as physical health and it should treated as such.
There is a long waiting time, no beds (especially for adolescents); and the limited services available are clearly stretched and so are unable to provide adequate care for the patients that so badly need it.
I want to see a better funding for mental health services across the country, especially for adolescents as I have already lost friends due to lack of services or services that did not help adequately.
Please help this cause, it is a necessity that is not being taken seriously enough.
